title: Collecting Soil Samples | From the Ground Up

tasks.task: Soil Testing for Garden and Landscapes
subtasks: Take soil samples from garden beds
Collect top four to six inches of soil
Mix soil thoroughly in a bucket
Dry soil to prevent shipping issues
Transfer sample into a quart bag
Ensure sample contains only soil, no plant material or organic matter
Mail soil sample to laboratory
Contact local extension office for assistance with sampling or lab information

tasks.task: Wanting a soil analysis device featured in Men in Black
subtasks: Imagining a tool that analyzes soil with a spoon and button
Acknowledging absence of such a tool
Emphasizing reliance on traditional laboratory testing
Hosting or participating in video production
Informing viewers about soil testing importance
Sharing soil sampling process and tips
Encouraging viewers to reach out for assistance

tasks.task: Promoting University of Wyoming Extension services
subtasks: Mentioning extension office contacts for help
Referencing "From the Ground Up" video series
Repeating "The End" multiple times for effect
